title: July 2018 Mogadishu bombings
text:
The July 2018 Mogadishu bombings took place on July 7, 2018 when fighters of the <a href="Somalia">Somali</a> group <a href="Al-Shabaab%20%28militant%20group%29">Al-Shabaab</a> attacked the compound of Somalia's interior and security ministries in the center of <a href="Mogadishu">Mogadishu</a>. 
At least 20 people were killed and two dozen others wounded and all three gunmen were killed by the security forces.
Attack.
The attack started when the <a href="terrorist">terrorist</a>s detonated two car bombs outside the main gate of the <a href="interior%20ministry">interior ministry</a> building before three militants stormed it.
